member.name: T:Amazon.IoT1ClickDevicesService.Model.FinalizeDeviceClaimRequest
member.summary:
Container for the parameters to the FinalizeDeviceClaim operation. Given a device ID, finalizes the claim request for the associated device.
Claiming a device consists of initiating a claim, then publishing a device event, and finalizing the claim. For a device of type button, a device event can be published by simply clicking the device.

member.summary:
Given a device ID, finalizes the claim request for the associated device.
Claiming a device consists of initiating a claim, then publishing a device event, and finalizing the claim. For a device of type button, a device event can be published by simply clicking the device.
